item.title: Day0 - Let there be Loom
item.description: What is Loom? Loom is a headless media asset management server platform. It provides tools to inventory your media assets and extract the most information from them.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: --- database: host: "127.0.0.1" port: 5432 username: "postgres" password: "finger" databaseName: "loom" minPoolSize: 5 acquireIncrement: 5 maxPoolSize: 20 jdbcUrl: "jdbc:postgresql://127.
